lead_paragraph: Serbia coach Radovan Curcic had his contract terminated by mutual consent on Wednesday, prompting the national team's director Savo Milosevic to follow in his footsteps and quit, the Balkan nation's football association (FSS) said.

headline.print_headline: Serbia Part Company With Boss Curcic, Director Milosevic Quits
headline.main: Serbia Part Company With Boss Curcic, Director Milosevic Quits
